option.name: fixedForm
option.title: Fixed-form format
option.help: Select this if the source file is in fixed-form reference format, otherwise free-form is assumed

option.name: fixedColumnIndicator
option.title: Indicator column in fixed format
option.help: Number of the indicator column (in fixed format)

option.name: fixedColumnText
option.title: Column of ignored text in fixed format
option.help: Column number where the so-called Program Name Area begins (in fixed format)
